title: Pakistan Citizen Portal getting continuous popularity in masses; becomes voice of Overseas Pakistanis
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 11 (APP):With a total number of registered members reaching 1,476,486 and a record 30 percent increase during the month of January 2020 alone as against December 2019, Pakistan Citizen Portal was getting continuous popularity in the general public.
According to the data released by Prime Minister’s Performance Delivery Unit (PMDU) here Tuesday, a total of 1,626,954 out of 1,780,844 complaints registered at Pakistan Citizen Portal have so far been addressed.
With a total of 88,417 out of 113,000 complaints lodged by the Overseas Pakistanis, the Portal had also become the voice of Pakistani expatriates.
The data released by PMDU showed the numbers of complaints addressed from Punjab – 733,975 out of 778,017; Center – 576,452 out of 615,742; Khyber Pakhtunkhwa – 203,184; Sindh – 91,787; and Balochistan – 14,160.
